name: Morphopolis
summary: Morphopolis is a game about transformation and discovery. Inspired by Machinarium and The Tiny Bang Story, Morphopolis takes the player through a lucid and fantastical insect world in a hidden object adventure. Taking the role of an aphid grub, you embark on a parasitic crusade. The game is for Steam, iOS, Android, Blackberry and Windows Phone 8.
